'''Rosemary''' is an open-world [[NPC]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]]. She can be found outside the city's front gate with her husband [[Parsley]], watching over their son [[Sage]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Parsley, Rosemary & Sage.png|Rosemary's location
NPC Location Parsley, Rosemary & Sage Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
She and Parsley are implied to hail from [[Snezhnaya]]. They moved and settled in Mondstadt.

===Appearance===
She has brown hair and green eyes, wearing a blue-white shirt.

{{Dialogue End}}

==Dialogue==
{{Transclude|Parsley|Dialogue}}

==Trivia==
* [[Parsley]], Rosemary, and [[Sage]] are all named after herbs. This may be a reference to the lyrics of some versions of the traditional English ballad, {{w|Scarborough Fair (ballad)|Scarborough Fair}}, in which the line "Parsley, sage, rosemary, and thyme" form part of the refrain.
